channel.title: Error Checking - Other Methods :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Video Script Let’s go over a couple other error checking methods that you might run across, we’re not going to go into these in too much detail because they are kind of complex at this level. But we’ll give you an idea of what’s out there, just so you can say you’ve seen it. One interesting example is the cyclic redundancy check or CRC. With CRC will have some sort of binary value.
